name: Rendevous
description:
A short and sweet platformer originally made for CGAJam and iluJam 3 but I only finished it in time for iluJam 3.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Princess Vidella's castle has been robbed and Princess Vidella herself was kidnapped! Only Sheriff Rasputia can save her from the bandits!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys to move and space to shoot/continue the text.

NOTE: There are bugs when it comes to the textbox.
(Sorry! It's my first time learning to program a textbox!
I'll hopefully figure out how to fix it soon)
